introduction: ◎片　　长　94 Mins◎导　　演　彼得·马寇 Peter Markle◎主　　演　加布里埃尔·安瓦尔 Gabrielle Anwar ... Caroline科林·伊格斯菲德 Colin Egglesfield ... Tucker LongstreetPancho Demmings ... Sheriff BurkeAndrew W. Walker ... Agent Matthew BurnsJud Tylor ... Josie LongstreetJennifer Taylor ... SusieDrew James ... Bobby LeeAntonio D. Charity ... Toby MarchKym Jackson ... Edda Lou Hatinger艾德·劳特 Ed Lauter ... Austin HatingerJosh Blaylock ... Cy Hatinger莱德·罗 Brad Rowe ... DwayneJohn Lacy ... Junior米娅·柯泰特 Mia Cottet ... DarleenJudson Mills ... Billy T Bonny◎简　　介World famous violinist Caroline Waverly returns to her home town of Innocence to retreat from the world. But a serial slayer is stalking the streets of Innocence, and Caroline may be a prime target for murder.In a Mississippi backwater, slick womanizer Tucker Longstreet enjoys the good life, managing the luxurious family trust for himself, screw-up big brother Dwayne and sister Josie. Tucker suddenly becomes the prime suspect in FBI agent Matthew Burns's search for a serial killer, whose victims include two or his flirts, including crazy brute Austin Hatinger's daughter Edda Lou, who falsely claimed to be carrying his child. Tucker's new neighbor, retired concert violinist Caroline Waverly, initially mistrusts him, having just moved in to her recently deceased grandma's house, but soon appreciates his charms and generosity, even to Austin's abused boy Cy, and becomes his lover. But the violent crime rage is far from over.
